授業目的: This course follows the course "Christianity A" with the purpose to look beyond introductory knowledge for sharing the various expressions of Christianity present in art, music, literature, and film, as well as in the quests for social justice and in social issues of today.
到達目標: Students will learn about and explore together: the influence of Christianity through the arts and more in society, mostly from the North American and European contexts, but with opportunity to explore within Japan and the students’ own country of origin also.
授業方法: This course will have a mixture of lectures including two guest lectures (virtual), group discussions, possibly a workshop and/or field trip, and the mutual exchange of learning interests between students through presentations and/or paper readings. Class attendance and participation in discussions will be paramount.
